DOC.brief_summary: This multi-center , non-drug study explore relationship exploratory biomarkers functional dimension male adult individual Autistic Disorder Asperger 's Syndrome healthy volunteer control . Subjects undergo number assessment study visit Day 1 .
DOC.brief_title: A Non-Drug Study Relationship Between Exploratory Biomarkers Functional Dimensions Individuals With Autistic Disorder Asperger 's Syndrome
DOC.criteria: Individuals Autistic Disorder Asperger 's Syndrome : Male adult , 18 45 year age inclusive Diagnosis Autistic Disorder Asperger 's Syndrome define DSMIV IQ > 70 Body mass index ( BMI ) 18 35 kg/m2 Availability reliable caregiver , able willing provide information regard individual 's behavior symptom Healthy control : Healthy male adult , 18 45 year age inclusive IQ > 70 Body mass index ( BMI ) 18 30 kg/m2 General exclusion criterion : Positive test drug abuse alcohol Confirmed systolic blood pressure > 140 < 90 mmHg , diastolic blood pressure > 90 < 50 mmHg Resting pulse rate > 100 < 40 beat per minute Alcohol and/or substance abuse/dependence last 12 month Concomitant disease condition could interfere , treatment might interfere , conduct study , would , opinion investigator , pose unacceptable risk subject study Additionally individual Autistic Disorder Asperger 's Syndrome : History epilepsy/seizure disorder ( except simple febrile seizure ) Significant disruptive , aggressive selfinjurious , sexually inappropriate behavior last 3 month opinion investigator might interfere conduct study Additionally healthy control : Clinically significant abnormality laboratory test result History current psychiatric , neurological disorder pervasive developmental disorder
